LanguageData.AdaptableMechanoids.Settings.HardModeDes: When enabled, mechanoids will draw from a (nearly) infinite pool of armor points and will eventually reach max stats in all categories.
LanguageData.AdaptableMechanoids.Settings.UseHeatDesc: When enabled, mechanoids will tap into their heat armor for points, as well as blunt and sharp.
LanguageData.AdaptableMechanoids.Settings.AdaptationT: At what interval mechanoids will adapt.
LanguageData.AdaptableMechanoids.Settings.AdaptationS: How many armor % will be adapted per interval.
LanguageData.AdaptableMechanoids.Settings.MaxValueDes: The maximum value that mechanoid armor can achieve. Use armor unlocker mods for best effect.
